entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
